content: need a last minute christmas present this is a simple quick sock to knit needle 4 mm and aran weight yarn just a few days to finish perfect for your dh you still could not find a present for or for your dad who always walk on wooden shoes very elastic so always the perfect fit thank you for almost 500♥ and the patterns has been download for over 1700 times ♥♥ 1-1-2017
